verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> them; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4964>control<s%> of the <S%H9019>chief<s%> <S%H9019>city<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> these to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had subdued: <S%H3533><s%>

from <S%H758>Aram<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and from the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah.<s%>
